, near the Four Corners, at the base of Mesa Verde National Park. Surrounded by rangeland and mountains, Mancos offers a variety of outdoor recreational activities. The Town was founded in 1894, near the site where early Spanish explorers first crossed the Mancos River. It is the commercial center for east Montezuma County.

content=The Enchanted Mesa Motel has been a fixture in Mancos, Colorado since 1954 and is now under new family ownership and management.  All rooms have either queen or king sized beds, wireless internet connection, in room coffee, cable television, micro-wave and refrigerator.  Also provide a computer in the lobby for guest use during lobby hours.
